title: 崩溃报告有没有大神能帮忙看一下
author: 日月星辰
txt_content:

replies.author: XVII_hao
replies.txt_content:
Mantle Environment: DO NOT REPORT THIS CRASH! Unsupported mods in environment: optifine
意思就是Mantle Environment不支持Optifine，那么删除Optifine……

replies.author: dfnjy
replies.txt_content: 你往TE打粉机里扔什么了？ 更新下ThermalExpansion 现在是4.0.3B1-218

replies.author: nice丿猫
replies.txt_content:
Details:
Name: thermalexpansion.Pulverizer // cofh.thermalexpansion.block.machine.TilePulverizer
Block type: ID #705 (tile.thermalexpansion.machine // （出错物品ID 705   TE的）cofh.thermalexpansion.block.machine.BlockMachine)
Block data value: 1 / 0x1 / 0b0001
Block location: World: (-622,63,1006), Chunk: (at 2,3,14 in -39,62; contains blocks -624,0,992 to -609,255,1007), Region: (-2,1; contains chunks -64,32 to -33,63, blocks -1024,0,512 to -513,255,1023)（所在坐标）
Actual block type: ID #705 (tile.thermalexpansion.machine // cofh.thermalexpansion.block.machine.BlockMachine)
Actual block data value: 1 / 0x1 / 0b0001

综上是TEID为705的方块出了问题，假如游戏都进不去的话简单的解决办法就是删掉TE
